item.title: Eventified
item.author: wiparker2020@gmail.com (William Parker)
item.description:
An Android calendar app for school clubs.

Arriving at SNHU

It was my first semester on campus at Southern New Hampshire University (SNHU). Covid was the year prior, so my class along with the cohort below me was new to the campus. I had experience with Java in my high school and even taught the AP course on it. They also taught Java in the first coding class of SNHU, so going into my second year I figured I would want to use it in team based projects.
